name: Connie Settles
text:
This was a wonderful experience! The atmosphere is casual and the food is delicious! The stews were not too spicy and the care of the staff is awesome. The children who would not venture to try new dishes were delighted with the basic nuggets and hamburger that any adult would enjoy. The quality of the food is superb!
You must stop in if you are in this area.

name: Indiana J0nes
text:
Awesome dishes. We ordered goat soup and grilled goat. Both meals were delicious. I didn't know goat could taste so good. It was better than beef.

Our server was the best. He was friendly and took his time with all his customers. He was nice and gave us complimentary somosas.

The music was great. There was a fireplace. Great decisions. We are definitely going back soon!

name: Joseph Gray
text:
First off, let me just point out that right here in Birmingham Alabama there is a place called Rafikis which serves extremely authentic African cuisine... Anyone else find this astoundingly amazing?

From the moment we walked in to the moment we left we had permanent smiles. And so did the owner. He greeted us with such joy and enthusiasm right from the start. Our service was prompt. He offered suggestions for appetizers and even treated us to one because he was so excited for us to taste African food for the first time. Neither of us had ever tried goat before so we both ordered the goat entrees. My goat stew was so tender and delicious, with spices I've never tasted before in a stew. We ordered almost all of the side dishes, all of which were absolutely incredible. Our host popped in occasionally to tell us how to pair certain sides with out entrees and he was always so happy to see us enjoy our meal. He even took some time to tell stories about his grandfather. It wasn't long before a friend of his sat down near us and began to make conversation. It really is the sort of environment where anyone could step in and immediately be a friend to everyone within 20 yards of them.  We will be back here in no time. Probably the best experience we have had at a restaurant here in Birmingham.

name: Kimberly Ayers
text: The service was spectacular and the food even better. I especially enjoyed the salsa (not the actual name of the dish) and cabbage….very good. The staff was accommodating and pleasant. It's a nice atmosphere to have a nice meal.

name: Dynamite Hill-Smithfield Community Land Trust
text: We held a fundraiser and excellent Panel Discussion here and it was as always an incredible experience. The food, the food, the food, absolutely incredible, and the most kind service we have experienced. Thank you for supporting our work!

name: Melanie Alexander
text: Unfortunately we discovered this jewel on the last day they will be open. The food and the service wete both excellent. We wish Ann and her husband all the best in their next endeavor.

name: Daniel Knight
text: This is the most incredible place I've ever been! Food is amazing and so is the service!! The grilled goat is my personal favorite

name: Ryan H
text: It was amazing!  We ordered most of what was on the menu and shared amongst the goup. It was all fantastic! Great service as well, and at a super reasonable price. We will be back for sure!

name: Chibuike Ulasi
text: Nice place to eat African food and enjoy African music. Sad that this place is closed for good.

name: Jenn Hoover
text: We went at a weird time,  and it didn't feel like a restaurant, and some of the food is spicy. The steak is very good!

name: MD Yasser Karim
text: Awesome food!! Had the grilled goat. Service was also good.

name: Michael Staggs
text: The grilled goat is amazing, but so are the stews. The tilapia is the biggest filet you've ever seen. The cornmeal mush sounds unappealing,  but it tastes like mashed potatoes. I can't get enough of this place - going again today!

name: A McKinney
text: The hostess at the front door had a terrible attitude. They charge a cover to come in for dinner. We asked why and were told since they play music we had to pay a cover to listen to their loud music while we ate. I was very disappointed that our treatment was so bad we really had been looking forward to eating here. We paid the cover but left due to the rude hostess.

name: Zipporah Gitiba
text: My all time favorite joint.  I love the way they cook ugali and nyama choma...it has become my second home.

name: Taryn List
text: The restaurant was clean, our server was helpful and the food was pretty good. Major downside for my family was the restaurant had ZERO high chairs, yet offered a kid menu. I had to strap my 1 year old to a chair using my belt, and this is not the way I wanted to enjoy my meal. Awful awful awful for families, will not go back.

name: Steve James
text: As a frequent visitor to Kenya I looked forward to eating at your place. I ordered lamb with Sakuma chipate and Ugali. The lamb was good as the greens but the chipate was hard and stale and the Ugali did not resemble real Kenyan Ugali. You should improve on your standards. Kenyan food is to be wonderful.

name: Carl Kalota
text: Owner took us through the menu and helped us make choices.  Food was delicious

name: belinda franks
text: Took 15 mins before we saw a waitress,music was so loud you couldn't hear what she was saying we asked for menus but never got them &she never returned to get our food order. Will not go back.

name: Samar Misra
text: Wonder since when this was open?  Is this an Ethiopian restaurant and I hear of the new one in Downtown Birmingham, AL?

name: Brad Meyers
text: Good food,  but closing permanently June 4, 2017

name: David Fletcher
text: Good food when I went, but the service was VERY slow. Waited about 20 mins for a drink order to be taken.

name: Millionaire Healthwell
text:
Charles has the best  I've eaten in the ....wow.
Hint: grilled goat.

name: Joey Mead
text: Try the goat. Good service as well.

name: Priyesh Pomal
text: They r closed

name: Burr Battle
text: Like everyone said, it's all about the goat, (stew)!

name: Danny Mac2020
text: Best people, great atmosphere and the best food !!!!

name: kamaumoses
text: Very good food

name: Katie Miller
text: Awesome food!!
